Description: Fires a projectile at a target up to 12 tiles away, dealing (DamageMax * 1.5) damage and applying a weaken effect of (Control Slots * 4%) for 15 seconds.
Creates a shield around the creature that increases accuracy and melee defense by 15% for 60 seconds (cannot stack).
If stealthed, creature's next melee attack gains +25% accuracy and deals +150% damage.
Has a 15% chance when taking damage to inflict that damage (ignoring armor) also onto the attacker, with damage amount capped at (DamageMax * 1.0).
Fires projectiles at a location up to 12 tiles away hitting up to 4 targets within 2 tiles. Inflicts (DamageMax * 1.0) bleed damage over for 15 seconds, with the first target hit taking +50% damage.
Has a 15% chance on melee attack to inflict (DamageMax * 1.0) bleed damage over 15 seconds.
Create makes its normal melee attacks as ranged attacks up to 12 tiles away. Hits have a 15% chance to inflict Bleed ability on target.
Fires a projectile at a target up to 12 tiles away, inflicting (DamageMax * 1.0) bleed damage over 15 seconds.
Consumes up to 10 blood within 6 tiles to increase accuracy by (10% + (Blood Consumed * 0.75%)) for 30 seconds (cannot stack).
Consumes up to 10 blood within 6 tiles to increase melee attack speed by (7.5% + (Blood Consumed * 0.5%)) for 30 seconds (cannot stack).
If below 66% hit points, will consume up to 10 blood within 6 tiles to restore (5% + (Blood Consumed * 0.5%)) of maximum health.
Consumes up to 10 blood within 6 tiles to increase melee damage by (15% + (Blood Consumed * 1%)) for 30 seconds (cannot stack).
Consumes up to 10 blood within 6 tiles to increase magic resist by (60 + (Blood Consumed * 4)) for 30 seconds (cannot stack).

Fires 3 waves of projectiles in a 8 tile radius, with each wave hitting up to 6 targets. Each hit inflicts (DamageMax * 0.33) damage and has a 10% chance to inflict (DamageMax * 0.25) disease damage every 5 seconds for 20 seconds.
Has a 15% chance on melee attack to inflict (DamageMax * 2.0) bleed damage over 15 seconds.
Teleports to a location up to 12 tiles away, hitting up to 3 targets within 1 tile. Inflicts (DamageMax * 0.8) damage, with the first target hit taking +50% damage.
Has a 15% chance on melee attack to inflict (DamageMax * 0.9) damage and apply a chill effect of (Control Slots * 2%) for the next 60 seconds (stacks up to 25%).

Teleports to a location up to 12 tiles away, hitting up to 3 targets within 1 tile. Inflicts (DamageMax * 0.7) damage, with the first target hit taking +50% damage. Applies a chill effect of (Control Slots * 2%) for the next 60 seconds (stacks up to 25%).
Successful melee attacks inflict an additional (DamageMax * 0.4) to a random target within 1 tile.

Fires a projectile at a target up to 12 tiles away, inflicting (DamageMax * 1.75) damage that ignores half of target's armor. Damage is increased by 50% if tamer has a barding effect active on the target.
Creature makes its normal melee attacks as ranged attacks up to 12 tiles away. Hits have a 15% chance to inflict (DamageMax * 0.5) disease damage every 5 seconds for 20 seconds.

Fires a projectile at a location up to 6 tiles away, hitting up to 3 targets within 1 tile. Inflicts (DamageMax * 0.33) disease damage every 5 seconds for 20 seconds, with the first target hit taking +33% damage.

Has a 15% chance on melee attack apply a pierce effect of (10 * Control Slots) for 15 seconds. If successful, has a (10% * Control Slot) chance to Hinder creatures for 3 seconds or Hamstring players for 2 seconds.

Detonates a location 1 tile away, hitting up to 3 targets within 3 tiles. Inflicts (DamageMax * 0.25) damage that ignores half of target's armor and also inflicts (DamageMax * 0.33) disease damage every 5 seconds over 20 seconds. The first target hit also takes +33% normal and disease damage.
Can consume nearby corpses to heal 15% of maximum health.
Teleports to a location up to 12 tiles away, hitting up to 3 targets within 2 tiles. Inflicts (DamageMax * 0.75) damage, with the first target hit taking +50% damage.
Melee attacks have a 10% chance to restore 5% Health and to inflict an additional (DamageMax * 1.5) damage which ignores armor.
Has a 15% chance on melee attack to inflict (DamageMax * 0.5) disease damage every 5 seconds for 20 seconds.
Creature has reduced Aggro.
Has a 15% chance on spellcast to apply a hex effect of (Control Slots * 25) for 15 seconds. Will also hinder creatures for (Control Slots * 1) seconds or hamstring players for 2 seconds.

Fires projectiles in a 6 tile radius, hitting up to to 5 targets. Inflicts (DamageMax * 0.75) damage, with the first target hit taking +50% damage. Applies a cripple effect of (Control Slots * 2%) and pierce effect of (Control Slots * 5) for 15 seconds.

Has a 15% chance on spellcast to inflict (DamageMax * 1.0) bleed damage over 15 seconds.
Creates a shield around the creature that increases melee damage by 15% and armor by 30 for 60 seconds (cannot stack).

Creates a shield around the creature that increases spell damage by 15% and magic resist by 60 for 60 seconds (cannot be stacked).

Hits up to 3 targets within 3 tiles, inflicting (DamageMax * 0.75) bleed damage over 15 seconds, with the first target hit taking +50% bleed damage. Will restore (Targets Hit * 2%) of maximum health.

Fires projectiles in a long narrow cone, hitting up to 3 targets. Inflicts (DamageMax * 0.5) damage, with the first target hit taking +50% damage. Applies a pierce effect of (Control Slots * 10) for 30 seconds, with damage increased by 50% if target reduced to 0 armor.
